title: An Agricultural Officer in Papua and New Guinea

abstract: Produced in 1961 by the Australian Commonwealth Film Unit for the Department of Agriculture, Stock and Fisheries, Territory of Papua and New Guinea - shows an agricultural officer at work in Papua New Guinea.
description: Presents the work being done in Papua and New Guinea by the Department of Agriculture to produce better stock and crops, and the opportunities for young men in this field. Various special training and research centres are shown, including the veterinary laboratory, rubber experimental station, cattle breeding station, and extension centres where people are trained as Agricultural Field Assistants.
